tier.item: 6 (4) A on kogda priezzhaet?
"So when is he coming?"
6 (4) A on kogda priezzhaet?
"So when is he coming?"
6 (4) A on kogda priezzhaet?
So when is he coming?
5 5 (5) Ya nikogda ne ezdila v Moskvu. A ty?
"I have never gone to Moscow. How about you?"
5 5 (5) Ya nikogda ne ezdila v Moskvu. A ty?
"I have never gone to Moscow. How about you?"
5 5 (5) Ya nikogda ne ezdila v Moskvu. A ty?
I have never gone to Moscow. How about you?
(8) A u nimani o'rgatadi?
"So, what does he teach?"
(8) A u nimani o'rgatadi?
"So, what does he teach?"
A u nimani o'rgatadi?
So, what does he teach?
